de.polygonal.ds.TreeBuilder

type
class
A helper class for building tree structures. The class manages two pointers: A 'vertical' pointer and a 'horizontal' pointer. The vertical pointer moves up and down the tree using the node's parent field, while the horizontal pointer moves left/right over the children using the prev/next fields.

Constructor

new(node : TreeNode<T>)
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid node (if debug flag is set).
Creates a TreeBuilder object pointing to node.

Instance Methods

appendChild(x : T) : TreeNode<T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid vertical pointer (if debug flag is set).
Appends a child node storing x to the children of the vertical pointer.

childEnd() : Bool

returns
True if the horizontal pointer was updated, otherwise false (no children).
Moves the horizontal pointer to the first child of the node referenced by the vertical pointer.

childStart() : Bool

returns
True if the horizontal pointer was updated, otherwise false (no children).
Moves the horizontal pointer to the first child of the node referenced by the vertical pointer.

childValid() : Bool

Returns true if the horizontal pointer is valid.

down() : Bool

returns
True if the vertical pointer was updated, otherwise false (node has no children).
Moves the vertical pointer one level down, so it points to the first child.

getChildNode() : TreeNode<T>

Returns the child node that the tree builder is currently pointing at or null if the child pointer is invalid.

getChildVal() : T

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid child pointer (if debug flag is set).
Returns the element stored in the child pointer.

getNode() : TreeNode<T>

Returns the node that the tree builder is currently pointing at or null if the pointer is invalid.

getVal() : T

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid pointer (if debug flag is set).
Returns the element stored in the node that the tree builder is currently pointing at.

insertAfterChild(x : T) : TreeNode<T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid vertical pointer (if debug flag is set).
Appends a child node storing x to the node referenced by the vertical pointer.

insertBeforeChild(x : T) : TreeNode<T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid vertical pointer (if debug flag is set).
Prepends a child node storing x to the child node referenced by the horizontal pointer.

nextChild() : Bool

returns
True if the horizontal pointer was updated, otherwise false (no more children).
Moves the horizontal pointer to the next child.

prependChild(x : T) : TreeNode<T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid vertical pointer (if debug flag is set).
Prepends a child node storing x to the children of the vertical pointer.

prevChild() : Bool

returns
True if the horizontal pointer was updated, otherwise false (no more children).
Moves the horizontal pointer to the previous child.

removeChild() : Bool

returns
True if the child node was removed, otherwise false.
Removes the child node referenced by the horizontal pointer and moves the horizontal pointer to the next child.

root() : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid pointer (if debug flag is set).
Moves the vertical pointer to the root of the tree.

setVal(x : T) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid pointer (if debug flag is set).
Stores the element x in the node that the tree builder is currently pointing at.

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object.

up() : Bool

returns
True if the vertical pointer was updated, otherwise false (node has no parent).
Moves the vertical pointer one level up.

valid() : Bool

Returns true if the pointer is valid.
